name: Cruise & Co.
description:
Manage your children while speeding! The dream of any masochistic human! See the Jam version for actual functionality! (https://blinkenlights.itch.io/cruiser-co-jam-version)

Combining the genres Casual Racing/Dodging with Choice (LD41), we come across a businessman up to the ears with stress and multitasking. How far will he make it? Probably not further than 100MPH
Controls: 'Ctrl' is start & pause (didn't pick 'Esc' for all the full-screen users)
          'w'/'up' & 's'/'down' to steer the car
          'a'/'left' & 'd'/'right' to choose a response

Art, Fonts, Coding and Voice-over by myself. (Voice-over currently not working?)
Using Unity, GIMP, Audacity & Atom.

As this is my first proper game, any and all feedback would be highly appreciated. I would also like to hear any tips or potential improvements you might have.
